snippet: Biofeedback devices for blood pressure frequently offer a Zen-like approach, using music and visual cues to guide users through breathing exercises. But studies show they may have little long-term impact.
abstract: Biofeedback devices for blood pressure frequently offer a Zen-like approach, using music and visual cues to guide users through breathing exercises. But studies show they may have little long-term impact.

headline.main: Really? The Claim: Biofeedback Devices Can Lower Blood Pressure
headline.print_headline: The Claim: Biofeedback devices can lower blood pressure.
